item.title: Post 1: Cyber Kill Chain
item.description: Post 1: Cyber Kill Chain ðŸ”—Instructions ðŸ”—This is a post based on homework given at the course: ICT Security Basics from Trust to Blockchain ICT4HM103-3003, 2022 Spring z) Read and summarize. Some bullets are enough for a summary. Hutchins et al 2011: Intelligence-Driven Computer Network Defense Informed by Analysis of Adversary Campaigns and Intrusion Kill Chains Darknet Diaries MITRE ATT&CK FAQ explains the ATT&CK Enterprise Matrix. Explain tactic, technique, and procedure in the context of ATT&CK, and give an example of each.
